short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upgrade your experience using Garmin Connect Web with an enhanced exercise search, filtering by muscle groups, previews, and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
 • Improved exercise search
 • Filter exercises by muscle group
 • Preview an exercise's muscle group targets
 • Apply the same exercise to multiple sets at once
 • Exercise weight retention
 • Favoriting exercises

For more information and demos, visit https://github.com/Wassup789/garmin-connect-enhancements
